info.description:
Last Updated Date 09th September 2020

Revision History:

Note: "x-" symbol should be ignored infront of Error Codes.
info.title: Evergent Rest API's --V10.00

post.description: createUser() REST API is used to create an account in Evergent system.

post.description: getOAuthAccessToken() REST API is used to SignIn the user with authCode (Combination of MobileNumber/Email and Device Details of the Customer).
getOAuthAccessTokenv2() REST API is used to signIn (Email/PhoneNumber/CpID) the customer on his device registered.

post.description: refreshToken() REST API is used to get the new accessToken of the customer when accessToken validity got expired.
isCustomerEligibleForFreeTrial() REST API is used to verify whether the customer is eligible for free trial for the account or not.
